PointerEventPressure.summary:
The pressure read-only property of the
interface indicates the normalized pressure of the pointer
input.
PointerEventPressure.value: The normalized pressure of the pointer input in the range of 0 to 1, inclusive, where 0 and 1 represent the minimum and maximum pressure the hardware is capable of detecting, respectively. For hardware that does not support pressure, such as a mouse, the value is 0.5 when the pointer is active buttons state and 0 otherwise.
